      @InitBinder public void initBinder​(org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder binder)

    • showPremieres

      @RequestMapping(value="/list-premieres", method=GET) public java.lang.String showPremieres​(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
      Shows the list of premieres of a user provided in the argument of the retrievePremieres method.

    • showAddPremierePage

      @RequestMapping(value="/add-premiere", method=GET) public java.lang.String showAddPremierePage​(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
      Shows the add premiere page.

    • deletePremiere

      @RequestMapping(value="/delete-premiere", method=GET) public java.lang.String deletePremiere​(@RequestParam int id)
      Deletes a list entry. Simulates an error message, when a user tries to delete the 6th entry.

    • showUpdatePremierePage

      @RequestMapping(value="/update-premiere", method=GET) public java.lang.String showUpdatePremierePage​(@RequestParam int id, org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model)
      Shows an updated premiere page.

    • updatePremiere

      @RequestMapping(value="/update-premiere", method=POST) public java.lang.String updatePremiere​(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model, @Valid @Valid Premiere premiere, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Updates a premiere by retrieving the user's name from the model. Redirects the user to the premiere list page.

    • addPremiere

      @RequestMapping(value="/add-premiere", method=POST) public java.lang.String addPremiere​(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap model, @Valid @Valid Premiere premiere, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Adds a new entry to the premiere list and redirects the user to the premiere list page.
